name: US Assault Survival Mission
description:
Discover the surrounding terrorists by radar, find a good place to shoot from long range, destroy enemies and save civilians. The army has provided you with all kinds of powerful weapons and equipment so that you can accomplish your missions better. Choose the weapon that suits you best, sniper rifle, assault rifle, heavy gun for your choice, put on the helmet that suits you best, go to the battlefield and join the battle. Yes, do not forget to bring a throwing knife, means tiger and other close weapons. Must make a comprehensive plan!

Features:
- First person shooter
- Amazing music and sound effects
- Fast paced game
- sophisticated radar system
- a variety of powerful weapons
- realistic shooting effect
- real battlefield environment
